Summary: Page Not Found - error message displays if the user clicks on a product in the Cart

Steps to reproduce.1: Add any item to the Cart
Steps to reproduce.3: Click on the product from the Cart

Actuale result: Page Not found error message displays
Expected result: User should be able to open the Product Details page by clicking on the product

Summary: The Total Price does not include the promo code discount

Steps to reproduce.1: Add any items, not from Sale or New Arrivals

Actuale result: The Total price is the same as before the discount was applied
Expected result: The total price must change to reflect the discount

Summary: The user is not able to come back to the Cart

Steps to reproduce.1: Add any product to the Cart

Actuale result: Nothing happens after the user clicks Edit Cart link
Expected result: - User should be navigated to the Cart page

Summary: Page Not Found error appears after the user clicks Shop Now button

Steps to reproduce.2: Click Shop now button for the Hero product

Actuale result: Page not found error message displays
Expected result: Product Details Page for the Hero product should open
